00023 #ifndef VHDVECTOR3_H
00024 #define VHDVECTOR3_H
00025 
00026 //remove warning conversion from double or float to vhtReal  
00027 #pragma warning(disable:4244)
00028 
00029 
00030 #include <ostream>
00031 #define vhtReal float
00032 
00042 class  vhdVector3
00043 {
00044 
00045 public:
00046         // coordinates
00047     vhtReal x, y, z;        
00048 
00049 public:
00050      vhdVector3();
00051      vhdVector3( vhtReal fX, vhtReal fY, vhtReal fZ );
00052          vhdVector3( const vhdVector3& rkVector );
00053 
00054          //vhtReal operator [] ( unsigned int index ) const;
00055          vhtReal& operator [] ( int index ) const;
00056 
00061          vhdVector3& operator = ( const vhdVector3& rkVector );
00062          bool operator == ( const vhdVector3& rkVector ) const;
00063          bool operator != ( const vhdVector3& rkVector ) const;
00064         
00065 
00066          // arithmetic operations
00067          vhdVector3 operator + ( const vhdVector3& rkVector ) const;
00068          vhdVector3 operator - ( const vhdVector3& rkVector ) const;
00069          vhdVector3 operator * ( vhtReal fScalar ) const;
00070          vhdVector3 operator * ( const vhdVector3& rhs) const;
00071          vhdVector3 operator / ( vhtReal fScalar ) const;
00072          vhdVector3 operator - () const;
00073 
00075          friend vhdVector3 operator * ( vhtReal fScalar, const vhdVector3& rkVector );
00076 
00077          // arithmetic updates
00078          vhdVector3& operator += ( const vhdVector3& rkVector );
00079          vhdVector3& operator -= ( const vhdVector3& rkVector );
00080          vhdVector3& operator *= ( vhtReal fScalar );
00081          vhdVector3& operator /= ( vhtReal fScalar );
00082          vhdVector3& operator *= ( const vhdVector3& rkVector );
00083          vhdVector3& operator /= (const vhdVector3& rkVector);
00084         
00085 
00086 
00089      friend std::ostream& operator <<
00090         ( std::ostream& o, const vhdVector3& v )
00091     {
00092         o << "vhdVector3(" << v.x << ", " << v.y << ", " << v.z << ")";
00093         return o;
00094     }

00098 };
